name: Modules.Cloud.KeyValues
summary: Provides methods for accessing ArrowDB Key-Values storage.

methods.name: append
methods.summary: Add the given value to the end of an existing value.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Key-Values: Append to a Key-Value for the request parameters supported by this method.

Not allowed on keyvalues with binary data.

Data is returned in the keyvalues property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
See Key-Value Store: Get a Value for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the keyvalues property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: increment
methods.summary: Increment the value by the given value.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Key-Values: Increment a Key-Value for the request parameters supported by this method.

Not allowed on keyvalues with binary data.

Data is returned in the keyvalues property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Key-Values: Delete a Key-Value for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: set
methods.summary: Sets a string or binary value referenced by the key name.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Key-Value Storage: Set a string or binary value for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
